Title: D4DJ: First Mix
Description:
['Having moved back to Japan from abroad, Rinku Aimoto transfers to Yoba Academy where DJing is popular. She is deeply moved by a DJ concert she sees there, and decides to form a unit of her own with Maho Akashi, Muni Oonaruto, and Rei Togetsu.', '
', '
', '
', '
While interacting with the other DJ units like Peaky P-key and Photon Maiden, Rinku and her friends aim for the high stage!', '
', '
', '
', '
(Source: Funimation)']
Related: ['Adaptation: Kyoukai no Kanata', 'Sequel: Kyoukai no Kanata']
Characters: ['Aimoto, Rinku', 'Oonaruto, Muni', 'Akashi, Maho', 'Togetsu, Rei', 'Yamate, Kyouko', 'Izumo, Saki', 'Inuyose, Shinobu', 'Miyake, Aoi', 'Fukushima, Noa', 'Aoyagi, Tsubaki']
Voices: ['Nishio, Yuuka', 'Mimura, Haruka', 'Kagami, Karin', 'Shizaki, Kanon', 'Terakawa, Aimi', 'Tsumugi, Risa', 'Takagi, Miyu', 'Tsunko', 'Satou, Hinata', 'Katou, Rihona']
